mapper.sql: id, name, path, mp4, url, status, bytes_in, bytes_out, addr, flashver, clientid, updateTime, createTime
mapper.update: update file_record set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mp4 = #{mp4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, bytes_in = #{bytes_in,jdbcType=BIGINT}, bytes_out = #{bytes_out,jdbcType=BIGINT}, addr = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flashver = #{flashver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, clientid = #{clientid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(*) from file_record where id=#{id}
